name: Silver Star
description:
This is a little project I've been working on since December of 2022. As of right now, it's just a basic movement demo with no way to win. However, it could become anything from a beautiful space odyssey to a psychological horror experience. Or both. Depends on how I'm feeling.

Fullscreen recommended. Only keyboard is supported for the time being. Controls on the start menu. Press 'escape' at any time to return to the main menu (will reset the game).
